General.Name: Alisa Pankki Oyj
General.Description: Alisa Pankki Oyj provides various banking and financial services to personal and business consumers in Finland, Denmark, Germany, and Poland. It offers online banking services, including current and saving accounts, term deposits, consumer credits, loans, credit cards, invoice financing, business loans, and business invoices. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
